title: Ara Ara~ Art Mom!
description:
Getting made fun of online is pretty tough, but what do you do when the big famous artist mocking your art is your own mom?!

During an online chat in an art community, Kaede Deiji discovers something she certainly did not want to hear!
And it's not the fact she needs to work on her anatomy.

matches.title: We Graduated From Being Sisters to Girlfriends
